title: Livia Firth unites Commonwealth with fashion
text:
Livia Firth unites Commonwealth with fashion Friday, February 02, 2018 - 01:45 
The Commonwealth Fashion Exchange pairs designers with artisan producers from 52 countries for a sustainable fashion extravaganza. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
